categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Teraah was a male Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. Following the Battle of Rishi, he was part of Darth Marr's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite Yavin Coalition along with Republic forces under Satele Shan.
Lord Teraah appears as a Sith Warrior trainer in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
